mapper.select:
SELECT
,if(cp_couponcondition=0, if(#{actActivityrule}=2 OR #{consemeAmt}>=cp_couponvalue,cp_couponvalue,0), if(#{consemeAmt}>=cp_couponcondition,cp_couponvalue/cp_couponcondition,0)) cp_rate FROM tbl_coupon WHERE cp_status = 0 AND (cp_limitation = #{cpLimitation} OR cp_limitation = 3) AND cp_userid = #{cpUserid} AND (current_date BETWEEN cp_begindate AND cp_enddate)
AND pk_activity NOT IN (SELECT pk_activity FROM tbl_activity WHERE act_Status = 0 AND (current_date BETWEEN act_BeginDate AND act_EndDate) AND act_ActivityRule = 2)
AND pk_activity IN (SELECT pk_activity FROM tbl_activity WHERE act_Status = 0 AND (current_date BETWEEN act_BeginDate AND act_EndDate) AND act_ActivityRule = #{actActivityrule})
ORDER BY if (cp_rate = 0,'9999-99-99', cp_enddate) ASC,cp_rate DESC limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_coupon( pk_activity, pk_couponvariety, cp_status, cp_limitation, cp_couponvalue, cp_couponcondition, cp_couponcode, cp_userid, cp_begindate, cp_enddate, cp_createdate, cp_updatedate) values ( #{pkActivity}, #{pkCouponvariety}, #{cpStatus}, #{cpLimitation}, #{cpCouponvalue}, #{cpCouponcondition}, #{cpCouponcode}, #{cpUserid}, #{cpBegindate}, #{cpEnddate}, #{cpCreatedate}, #{cpUpdatedate})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_coupon set cp_status = 1, cp_couponcode=if(TRIM(cp_couponcode)!='',CONCAT(TRIM(cp_couponcode),'_1'),cp_couponcode), cp_updatedate = now() WHERE pk_coupon = #{pkCoupon}
